abstract: Contents: The Meeting (prod./dir. Stephen Skok, 22 mins, 1985)--Living with forests (prod./dir. Ian Toohill, 29 mins, 1986)
description: The meeting: The impact of trailbikes in the forest of Rossburn is illustrated by flashbacks from the various interest groups. Living with forests: The future of Leadbeater's forest is the subject of a local enquiry. The viewer is asked to imagine that you are a member of the local community and give your views.
